Name: Crazy Traffic Racer
About the game: Crazy Traffic Racer is a new endless arcade race with the ability to break, blow up and crash cars from traffic. Drive along a busy road, earn money, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Take a fresh look at endless racing! KEY FEATURES - stunning 3D graphics - beautiful cars - a busy city - variety of vehicles including trucks, buses and SUVs - car improvement - the ability to destroy other cars on the road.
